titles.title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to appear as amicus curiae in the name of the Senate in United States of America v. John M. Mistretta.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 5/24/1988--Introduced. Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to appear as amicus curiae in the name of the Senate in United States of America v. John M. Mistretta in support of the constitutionality of the Sentencing Reform Act of 1984.
